ModMetaData.name: RimTalk - AI Quests
ModMetaData.author: Based on RimTalk by juicy
ModMetaData.description:
Dynamic AI-powered quest generation using RimTalk's AI integration!
This mod extends RimTalk to intercept quest generation and create dynamic, context-aware quest descriptions using AI. Every quest becomes unique with AI-generated narratives that adapt to your colony's situation.
Key Features: • AI-generated quest descriptions that feel natural and immersive • Reuses RimTalk's model configuration (Google Gemini, OpenAI, etc.) • Seamlessly integrates with RimWorld's quest system • Context-aware narratives based on your colony's state
Requirements: • RimTalk must be installed and configured with an API key • This mod will use your existing RimTalk AI settings
Attribution: This mod is a derivative work based on RimTalk by juicy, licensed under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0. Original RimTalk: https://github.com/juicycleff/RimTalk
